title: The Old Courthouse
description: The Old Courthouse, built in 1848, is a Neoclassical building that served as the original courthouse for the Niagara District.
question: When was The Old Courthouse built?

title: Morningstar Mill
description: Morningstar Mill is a picturesque heritage site featuring a working grist mill and a blacksmith's shop, originally built in 1872.
question: What year was Morningstar Mill built?

title: Rodman Hall Art Centre
description: Rodman Hall Art Centre, once a historic mansion, now houses contemporary art exhibitions and serves as a cultural hub for the community.
question: What is the primary purpose of Rodman Hall Art Centre today?
